column1: Human-Centred Big Data and Artificial Intelligence MSc
column3: School of Mathematics and Computer Science
column5: You will be trained in adventurous and exciting computational science, working on real-world challenges that will transform society and the economy. While there are valid concerns about what impact big data and artificial intelligence might have on individuals, communities, jobs and society, the Human-Centred Big Data and Artificial Intelligence programme focuses on human potential, needs, desires and cares, and how these motivations can be used to drive innovation.
column7: Please visit our website for the Human-Centred Big Data and Artificial Intelligence course fee information.
